docs.text: Pygustus A python wrapper for the gene prediction program AUGUSTUS. Requirements To use Pygustus, an installed or built version of AUGUSTUS is required. Using Ubuntu, AUGUSTUS can be installed as follows. sudo apt install augustus augustus-data augustus-doc More information can be found on the AUGUSTUS GitHub page . Installation TODO Usage TODO
